post.description: Employees or admins must specify clientId in the request body.

400.description: clientId must be provided when creating appointments as staff

patch.description: Reschedule an appointment to a new time and optionally a different employee. Use force=true to ignore conflicts.

409.description: Conflict - employee already booked for this time

get.description: Check if rescheduling an appointment would cause conflicts

post.description: Complete the visit checkout with payment method, amounts, tips, discounts, and optional product sales (upselling). Creates commission records.

400.description: Invalid payment data or appointment state

get.summary: Get all services with optional filters
Get all services with categories and variants
Get services available for online booking

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, SKU, barcode, brand

get.summary: Get product card details for warehouse view
Get product stock and sales history

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date for the summary period

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date for the summary period

200.description: Aggregated units and revenue if available

refreshToken.description: JWT refresh token (optional when sent via cookie)

clientId.description: Required when creating appointments as Employee or Admin

force.description: Force reschedule even if there are conflicts

unitPriceCents.description: Unit price in cents (optional, uses product price if not specified)

discountCents.description: Discount in cents for this item

amount.description: Total commission amount for the period

todayAppointments.description: Number of appointments scheduled for today

productId.description: The ID of the product being sold

unitPriceCents.description: Unit price in cents (preferred over unitPrice)

discountCents.description: Total discount in cents for this line

unitPrice.description: Unit price in standard currency units (deprecated, use unitPriceCents)

discount.description: Line discount in standard currency units (deprecated, use discountCents)

productId.description: The ID of the product being sold (legacy single-item payload)

quantity.description: Quantity of items sold (legacy single-item payload)

unitPriceCents.description: Unit price in cents (preferred over unitPrice)

discountCents.description: Total discount in cents (preferred over discount)

unitPrice.description: Unit price in standard currency units (deprecated, use unitPriceCents)

discount.description: Discount in standard currency units (deprecated, use discountCents)

employeeId.description: ID of the employee credited with the sale

items.description: Sale items (preferred over legacy single-item payload)

productId.description: ID of the product to adjust
